Package ohos.global.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.configuration.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Provides the configuration of the resource manager.

    You can use ResourceManager.getConfiguration() to obtain the configuration and ResourceManager.updateConfiguration(Configuration, DeviceCapability) to update the configuration.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    ResourceManager

      Modifier and Type Field Description

      Indicates that the color mode is automatically set or undefined.

      Indicates the user-preferred font size relative to the base screen density.

      Specifies whether the screen layout is from right to left.

      • colorMode

        public int colorMode
        Indicates the current color mode of your application. The value can be AUTO_MODE, LIGHT_MODE, or DARK_MODE.
        Since:
        5

      • direction

        Indicates the target direction.

        Indicates the user-preferred font size relative to the base screen density.
        Since:

      • isLayoutRTL

        public boolean isLayoutRTL
        Specifies whether the screen layout is from right to left. The value true indicates the right-to-left layout, and false indicates the left-to-right layout.
        Since:
        3
